reviews.title: Wonderful staff and hotel
reviews.text: Great place to staff unreal hotel wonderful clean and a very nice breakfast. add to this a super location and you have a winner

reviews.title: a 250 year-old mansion
reviews.text: The hotel de Guise is a 250 year-old mansion situated in the old part of Nancy. A superb entrance hall with stone and marble flooring leads us to the reception area with its 400 year-old stunning fireplace. This is where you will have breakfast.

However, you could be residing in one of the paper-thin walled annex rooms. the room had a stale like odour about it. I am sure the more expensive rooms in the building are much better. The hotel is conveniently located within easy walking distance of Stanislas Square and the small car park is useful even at the extra cost as parking on the street is at a premium. The location made up for the inadequacies of the room for one night.
reviews.title: Nice hotel, but an indifferent staff.
